oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ralph Emery On The Record with Lorrie Morgan - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording from Ralph Emery's (entertainer) interview of Lorrie Morgan (performer) for Ralph Emery: On the Record With Lorrie Morgan. The recording is performed in front of a live audience. The recording is from January 13, 1995. The tape is labeled part 2.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ralph Emery; Lorrie Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Lorrie Morgan discusses how it hurt when she and Troy Aikman broke up, and Ralph Emery and Morgan discuss the beginning of their relationship -- (01:59) Emery addresses a tabloid article that accuses Morgan of not liking country music, and Morgan denies any allegations -- (05:33) Emery recalls a story about when Morgan fell and revealed herself to the crowd -- (10:05) Emery asks Morgan to reflect on the comedic genes she received from George Morgan -- (12:11) Emery inquires about Morgan's theatric performances, and Morgan reflects on not allowing television to come between her and music -- (14:49) Emery plays a clip of Morgan acting for Proud Heart -- (15:50) Emery inquires about how Morgan was paired with Collin Wilcox-Paxton to perform for Proud Heart, and Emery stops for a break while Morgan praised Wilcox-Paxton -- (18:48) Emery and Morgan reflect on Wilcox-Paxton and how she was in: To Kill a Mockingbird -- (19:33) Emery and Morgan discuss how Morgan played Kris Kristofferson a number of her songs -- (21:34) Emery and Morgan joke about Morgan having a kiss with Kris Kristofferson -- (22:10) Emery praises "Merry Christmas from London," and Morgan excites from discussing the number of featured artists she had on the album -- (24:57) My Favorite Things [excerpt] (Lorrie Morgan) -- (25:49) Emery asks Morgan to reflect on where Morgan recorded her video for "My Favorite Things" -- (27:00) Emery praises Morgan's work with Frank Sinatra on "How Do You Keep the Music Playing?/My Funny Valentine" -- (29:10) Emery questions Morgan about her smoking issues, and Morgan reflects on her prayers -- (31:56) Emery asks Morgan to reflect on her upcoming projects -- (33:35) Emery dons his "War Paint" jacket, and Morgan discusses her pursuit of movie roles -- (35:25) Indistinguishable chatter in the background -- (36:19) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (36:38) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (36:56) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (37:47) Morgan chats with Emery -- (38:05) Morgan radio spot recording of key words -- (39:53) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (40:43) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (41:05) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (42:31) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (43:04) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC -- (43:17) Lorrie Morgan radio spot for the 22nd American Music Awards on ABC
